docs.title: Ellucian
docs.text: Ellucian serves over 2,900 higher-education institutions across 50 countries, providing the software that runs their institutions.

docs.title: Senior Technical Writer
docs.text:
In this role I created, designed, and maintained user-focused technical documentation for two complex ERP products using a Doc-as-Code approach. I was responsible for release notes, user guides, and reference guides. Below is an example of a reference topic I created:

Customer Defined Aid Year Control page | DITA XML source | PDF transform

docs.title: Content Designer
docs.text:
As a content designer for Ellucian, I scoped, designed, maintained, and improved complex conversation flows for AI virtual assistant. I also corrected 15% of ineffective global content via an innovative, novel solution that was successfully implemented in collaboration with product management and developers. Due to the proprietary nature of Virtual Advisor, I am unable to publish the conversation flows I worked on.

However, information about the product with some screenshots showing the conversation flows I worked on are available at Ellucian's website.

docs.title: University of Illinois Urbana Chamapaign
docs.text:
My earliest introduction to content design and strategy came while working in the financial aid office at the University of Illinois Urbana Champaign. In addition to developing presentations and publications for the office, I was responsible for content management on the public-facing office website. During my time in this role, the website underwent a complete resign, and I was tasked with ensuring that the content maintained its accuracy and user-focused approach throughout the project.

Before and after are available via web.archive.org here and here.
